## MarkdownBuilderOptions.width property

Width for word wrapping (default: 80).

**Signature:**

```typescript
width?: number;
```

## Remarks

The markdown renderer will wrap text to fit within this width. This is useful for ensuring content fits within your terminal or specific layout constraints.
